description: LARGE over 1800 sqft, 3BDRM 3BATH TOWNHOUSE! This is the first time on the market for this original owner home. Be in one of the best neighborhoods of Port Coquitlam at Riverland Estates. This 2 level townhouse has a number of updates throughout. Newer furnace and hot water tank. Newer elegant hardwood flooring. Newer appliances including gas stove. Enjoy a 'real' garage with side-by-side parking. Home offers 3 bedrooms up with large en-suite and walk-in closet in the Master. Relax by the gas fireplace and read a book or head to the private backyard to have a BBQ with your friends. If you'd rather explore, walk over to Blakeburn park or a quick hop to your major shopping. Close to schools and transit.
